net.javacoding.jspider.core.throttle
Interface ThrottleProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
DistributedLoadThrottleProvider, SimultaneousUsersThrottleProvider
public interface ThrottleProvider

Interface that should be implemented by each Throttle provider class. This allows for pluggable provider classes to be referenced from the configuration files. $Id: ThrottleProvider.java,v 1.2 2002/12/23 17:13:36 vanrogu Exp $

Author:
Günther Van Roey
